sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SOMBOR, or Ζομβοr, a city of the kingdom of Hungary, in the province of the hither Danube, in the circle of Kozep Jaras. It contains 2980 houses, with 14,860 inhabitants, whose chief trade is in corn and cattle. Lat. 48. 8. 32. Long. 21. 10. 33. E.
